name: The Goblin, The Witch, and The Forest
name_original: The Goblin, The Witch, and The Forest
description:
Survive the witch's deadly forest

Use left and right arrow keys to move and spacebar to jump

(This is a reupload of the project to make it playable in the browser)

Sounds that were outsourced:

Sound Credit:

Cat:

https://orangefreesounds.com/cat-meowing-sound-effect/

Wolf:

https://quicksounds.com/library/sounds/wolf “Wolves Barking and Howling”

Bear:

https://www.freesoundslibrary.com/bear-sounds/
